item.title: Nvidia, bitcoin and other falling stars drag the US stock market lower
item.description: The U.S. stock market fell as Nvidia and other superstars created by the frenzy around artificial-intelligence technology dimmed some more

item.title: Novo chops Wegovy prices, but doctors still see affordability challenges for patients
item.description: Novo Nordisk is chopping prices again for its popular obesity treatment Wegovy, but doctors say the expense will remain challenging for patients witho...

item.title: Ukraine signs a letter of intent to buy up to 100 Rafale warplanes from France
item.description: Ukraine has signed a letter of intent to buy up to 100 Rafale warplanes from France over the next 10 years

item.title: Dubai Air Show opens as local airlines likely seek more jets, defense remains a worry

item.title: New analysis shows more US consumers are falling behind on their utility bills
item.description: A new analysis of consumer data shows that more people in the United States are falling behind on their utility bills
